name: Digital8
description:
We are a full service tech team based in South Brisbane, Queensland. We specialise in web design, digital marketing and app development.
We specialise in develeoping mobile and web apps using industry leading best practice and the most sophisticated modern frameworks. We are engineers, ideators, thinkers, strategists and doers. 
We build in React Native, react.js, node.js, Drupal, Wordpress, Magento, Shopify and more.
We work closely with the Brisbane NFP community and are strong community advocates.
